name: lke-plugin-image-export
description: Allow custom image export of a graph

scripts.build:public: tsc -b src/public && cd custom-image-export.lke/public && browserify *.js --debug -o index.js && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: cp -R src/public/assets custom-image-export.lke/public && cp src/public/index.html custom-image-export.lke/public && cp -R src/manifest.json custom-image-export.lke/

author: Linkurious SAS
